subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: The Rams have won at least 26 games and been to the N.C.A.A. tournament each season since, in Shaka Smart’s first year as coach, they finished 27-9 and won the College Basketball Invitational.
snippet: The Rams have won at least 26 games and been to the N.C.A.A. tournament each season since, in Shaka Smart’s first year as coach, they finished 27-9 and won the College Basketball Invitational.
